app.name: Onye Enyemaka Ahụike AI
app.tagline: Onye Mmekọ Gị Na Ahụike. Ahụike. Dị Mfe
landing.hero.title: Onye Mmekọ Gị Na Ahụike.
landing.hero.subtitle: Ahụike. Dị Mfe
landing.hero.description: Nweta ahụmịhe nlekọta ahụike dị ka ọ dịbeghị mbụ site na onye enyemaka ahụike anyị nke AI na-eduzi. Nweta nghọta ahụike nke emere maka gị, debe nhọpụta, ma jikwaa njem ahụike gị—niile n'otu ebe.
landing.features.title: Ihe Niile Ị Chọrọ Maka Ahụike Ka Mma
landing.features.subtitle: Ngwa njikwa ahụike zuru oke emere iji mee ka njem nlekọta ahụike gị dị mfe ma ghara inwe nchegbu
landing.feature.aiCompanion.title: Onye Enyemaka Ahụike AI
landing.feature.aiCompanion.description: Kparịta ụka na onye enyemaka AI anyị nwere ọgụgụ isi maka nduzi ahụike ozugbo na nkwado ụbọchị niile
landing.feature.appointments.title: Nhọpụta Dị Mfe
landing.feature.appointments.description: Debe ma jikwaa nhọpụta na ndị na-enye nlekọta ahụike n'enweghị nsogbu site na ncheta WhatsApp
landing.feature.tracking.title: Nleba Anya Ahụike
landing.feature.tracking.description: Lelee usoro ahụike gị ma nweta nghọta nke emere maka gị iji melite ahụike gị
landing.feature.resources.title: Ihe Eji Arụ Ọrụ Ahụike
landing.feature.resources.description: Nweta ọbá akwụkwọ nke edemede ahụike a tụkwasịrị obi, ndụmọdụ na ọdịnaya mmụta
landing.feature.secure.title: Nchekwa & Nzuzo
landing.feature.secure.description: Data ahụike gị bụ nke ezochiri ma chekwaa ya site na ụkpụrụ nchekwa kacha mma n'ụlọ ọrụ
landing.feature.family.title: Nlekọta Ezinụlọ
landing.feature.family.description: Jikwaa ndekọ ahụike maka ezinụlọ gị niile site na otu dashboard
landing.cta.title: Ị Dị Njikere Ịgbanwe Njem Ahụike Gị?
landing.cta.subtitle: Sonye ọtụtụ puku ndị ọrụ na-atụkwasị anyị obi maka mkpa nlekọta ahụike ha
landing.footer.copyright: © 2024 Onye Enyemaka Ahụike AI. Ikike niile echekwara.
auth.signup.title: Mepụta Akaụntụ
auth.signup.subtitle: Sonye anyị ma malite njem ahụike gị taa
auth.signup.passwordHint: Ọ ga-abụrịrị opekata mpe mkpụrụedemede asatọ
auth.login.title: Nnọọ Ọzọ
auth.login.subtitle: Banye iji gaa n'ihu na njem ahụike gị
auth.login.orContinue: Ma ọ bụ gaa n'ihu na
dashboard.bookAppointment.description: Hazie nleta gị na-esote, nweta ncheta site na WhatsApp
dashboard.talkToAI: Gwa Onye Enyemaka Ahụike AI Gị Okwu
voice.tapToRead: Pịa ka ị gụọ n'olu dara ụda
error.invalidEmail: Biko nye adreesị email ziri ezi
error.passwordTooShort: Paswọọdụ ga-abụrịrị opekata mpe mkpụrụedemede asatọ
error.loginFailed: Email ma ọ bụ paswọọdụ ezighi ezi. Biko nwaa ọzọ.
error.networkError: Njehie netwọkụ. Biko lelee njikọ gị.
